attributes.action: Force OFGEM to apply the price cap to residential flats!
attributes.additional_details: The government need to force OFGEM to put a price cap on residential properties too. With the increase they are facing many people will not be able to afford to live in residential flats.
attributes.background: With the current price cap increase everyone is finding it hard to pay their bills. Residential properties however are not including in this cap there are receiving an increase of between 200%-300%. Force OFGEM to apply the cap to flats too!

rejection.details: The energy cap applies to anyone who is on a default energy tariff, including people in residential flats. You can find out more about the energy price cap here: https://www.ofgem.gov.uk/information-consumers/energy-advice-households/check-if-energy-price-cap-affects-you
